TopicTitle: Need help with Kerbal Attachment System

Articles.Content: Basically I can't get the KAS struts to work on my space station.  I got them to work on Kerbin while testing them out but when I got to space I have a flimsy part docked to the space station and no matter where I try to attach a strut it says "Target object not allowed".  I know for sure that the ships are docked which means I'm not trying to attach two separate ships and I'm also using the correct struts, not the stock ones, I'm using the orange ones from the kerbal attachment system mod.  I wouldn't bother the forums if I could find my answer somewhere else but I cant seem to find my problem anywhere.
Fixed it, I thought I was certain that I had one of the tools equipped but apparently not.
